Guard Mouen:
Welcome to the Town of Oren, young traveler. I am Mouen, guarding the town.
Because of our town's proximity to our rival, Elmore, we are on a higher state of alert than most towns. this sometimes causes travelers like you inconvenience, but please understand the circumstances.
Actually, the people here are much like the people of Elmore. Borders don't really mean much to people who cut wood for a living. I can name 10 people I know in Elmore off the top of my head...
Do you see that impressive castle on the northern hill? That is Castle Oren. Every time I see it I pray to God that the people of Oren will never know sorrow or death and that the people of Elmore will fell its power.
Quest
